EXAMPLE THM
HYPOTHESES: 
POINT A B C D E F G
R_TRIANGLE C A B
ON_LINE D A B
ON_LINE E B C
ON_LINE F B C
INTERSECTION_LL G A E D F
EQANGLE A C D A G D
EQANGLE A C D C B A
SHOW: PERPENDICULAR C G A E
A(312.000000000000000+7,75.000000000000000-24)  B(480.000000000000000+7,323.000000000000000-24)  C(312.000000000000000+7,323.000000000000000-24)  D(427.155492154065600+7,244.991440798858720-24)  E(396.000000000000000+7,323.000000000000000-24)  
F(367.999999999999940+7,323.000000000000000-24)  G(387.354959159859960+7,297.476546091015100-24)
